name: WP Remove Text & Visual Editor for beaver builder
author: Elad Itzkin

sections.description:
A Simple plugin to protect the work you have done on Beaver Builder by removing the visual and text interface on the post & page edit pages.
It require you to obviouslly have Beaver Builder installed, and Disable Gutenberg plugin.

Tested & stable with WordPress 5.2.3

WP Remove Text & Visual Editor for beaver builder

Contributors: eladitzkin
Donate link: https://www.paypal.me/eladitzkin/5eur
Tags: beaver, builder, text, editor, visual, removal
Requires at least: 4.6
Tested up to: 5.2.3
Stable tag: 4.3
Requires PHP: 5.2.4
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

A Simple plugin to hide away the text & visual editor when Beaver Builder is activated, require Beaver Builder and Disable Gutenberg to be installed.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. It’s already working, Enjoy.
sections.faq:
Will it work without Beaver Builder

No.

Will it work without Disable Gutenberg

Yes, as long as your Beaver Builder is working (for example on older version without Gutenberg)
